normal.title: Once More, Sortie Again!
normal.introduction: Less than a week after the Battle of Kula Gulf, the Sakura Fleet reassembled again to launch a covert transport operation to the Kolombangara Islands. Task Force 18, led by Honolulu and St Louis, was once again instructed to intercept the transport.
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
normal.additionalNotes: Once the boss shows up, it will spawn a chain of several suicide boats in a horizontal formation against your fleet which aims straight at your flagship.

hard.title: Once More, Sortie Again!
hard.introduction: Less than a week after the Battle of Kula Gulf, the Sakura Fleet reassembled again to launch a covert transport operation to the Kolombangara Islands. Task Force 18, led by Honolulu and St Louis, was once again instructed to intercept the transport.
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Preemptive Strike
normal.introduction: Our PBY recons have detected enemy forces to the south. However, they had already detected our radar signals first. The night battle is about to commence!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
normal.additionalNotes: The boss is escorted by 2 Heavy Cruisers which shield it from your escort ships. Best way to handle it is to have Battleships/Battlecruisers that can target the boss directly.

hard.title: Preemptive Strike
hard.introduction: Our PBY recons have detected enemy forces to the south. However, they had already detected our radar signals first. The night battle is about to commence!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Press the Attack
normal.introduction: Under the cover of night, the Sakura fleet scored several hits on our light cruisers with their prized oxygen torpedoes. However, their flagship, Jintsuu, has been heavily damaged concentrated fire from 152mm cannons, and is now retreating.
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
normal.additionalNotes: Enemy Boss is backed by 2 Battleships who will directly attack your backline ships, whereas the Boss will continuously spawn a volley of torpedoes. Over time some Suicide Boats will appear and head straight for your flagship.

hard.title: Press the Attack
hard.introduction: Under the cover of night, the Sakura fleet scored several hits on our light cruisers with their prized oxygen torpedoes. However, their flagship, Jintsuu, has been heavily damaged concentrated fire from 152mm cannons, and is now retreating.
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Counterattack

starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

names.jp: エンプレスオーガスタ

normal.title: Information Warfare
normal.introduction: Our submarines say the enemy is preparing a large-scale counterattack. We must make use of this information, stage an attack, and surprise the enemy!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Ambush
normal.introduction: The Mobile Fleet is being protected by a Destroyer Fleet as they practice! This is a superb opportunity to launch an all-out attack!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Carrier Showdown
normal.introduction: We've detected incoming large squadrons of enemy aircraft! Scramble your fighters and pull back the curtains on this decisive battle in the skies!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Task Force
normal.introduction: War has changed. Victory favors those who have gained air superiority. Launch your planes and seize control of the Mariana skies!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: The Skies Above
normal.introduction: The first wave of enemy aircraft is fast approaching! The decisive carrier battle is about to begin...
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: The Eternal Flute
normal.introduction: As the second wave of attacks approach, the sound of a flute heralds the coming of the final battle.
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: Wings of Inspiration
normal.introduction: Zuikaku, now a renowned veteran, takes up the banner of the First Carrier Division. Face her fierce assault with everything you have!
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map

normal.title: The Dancing Phoenix
normal.introduction: The final battle is now! Our target - the state-of-the-art armored carrier, Taihou! However, history may not repeat itself again...
starConditions: Sink all Fleets on the map
